name: SFCertificateTrustPanel
desc: A panel or sheet that lets the user edit the trust settings in any of the certificates in a certificate chain.

items.name: func beginSheet(for: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, trust: SecTrust!, message: String!)
items.desc: Displays a modal sheet that shows the results of a certificate trust evaluation and that allows the user to edit trust settings.

items.name: func informativeText() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the (optional) informative text currently displayed in the panel.

items.name: func runModal(for: SecTrust!, message: String!) -> Int
items.desc: Displays a modal panel that shows the results of a certificate trust evaluation and that allows the user to edit trust settings.

items.name: func setInformativeText(String!)
items.desc: Sets the (optional) informative text displayed in the panel.

items.name: class func shared() -> SFCertificateTrustPanel!
items.desc: Returns a fully initialized, singleton certificate trust panel object.
